column2: AAL Niranjan Jayasinghe for the Accused-Appellant.
Chethiya  Goonasekera DSG  for the Attorney General.
The  accused  appellant (hear in  after referred  to as  the accused)  in  this case  was  indicted  in  the

column1: high court of Kandy on the following charge:-

column2: On  or about  27th  of August  2008  within  the jurisdiction  of this  court  in  Kandy,  the accused  did

column1: punishable under section  296 of the Penal Code.
